Summer 2023 parking permits will be available to purchase beginning Monday, May 15, 2023 and are only available to purchase online
. 



License Plate Recognition (LPR) will launch to Student Commuters Fall 2023. Visit the LPR FAQ for details on virtual permits.

Parking & Transportation Services (P&TS)
Get In Touch

California State University, Fullerton800 N. State College Blvd,T-1400Fullerton, CA 92831

Office Hours The Parking Office window is open for assistance with online transactions. Have an inquiry? The Parking Inquiry Form is available to answer your question.

Media Inquiries For interview or media requests, please submit a Media Inquiry Form. 

Visitor Information Center Hours Associated VIC: Open Monday - Friday 8:00 a.m - 5:00 p.m. Eastside VIC: Open Monday - Thursday 8:00 a.m - 5:00 p.m.

Web Accessibility

			CSUF is committed to ensuring equal accessibility to our users.  Let us know about any accessibility problems you encounter using this website.
			We'll do our best to improve things and get you the information you need.
